overview: Newbie Zach was a good boy and brought home some freshman ass (Matt) for us to snack on. Slipped him a little something and dragged his ass onto the floor. We fucked it for a bit before dropping our loads in his sweet pretty hole. Later we dragged him outside and left him on the side of the road. A few days later he came back to the frat, asking questions about what happened, and guess what — somebody got him drunk again! Only this time there were three dudes pounding his hole! It gets worse…somebody called the cops! But Matt's our boy now and he's not pressing charges. Thanks Bro!
title: Pretty Boy
